about.title: About me.
about.description: Peruvian Frontend Developer with +3 years of experience, I have developed and maintained web and mobile applications using JavaScript, React, flutter, Firebase, NodeJs, MySQL along with other technologies, always motivated to help the team with my knowledge and experience. I am a technology fanatic always motivated to learn new things and take on new challenges. I love discussing topics related to efficiency optimization and use of best practices. I would like to work on projects related to blockchain and intelligence.
